title: Epic! Gives Kids Unlimited Access to a Massive Library of Children's Books

organizations.name: massive library of children's books giving

text:
Giving kids the power to choose what they read   them reading more. The Epic! app gives kids 12 and under access to over 20,000 books, including popular bestsellers and award winners. Advertisement 
Epic! works a lot like the Netflix of children’s books, putting the power of a library in kid’s hands. Once you’ve signed up for a subscription, kids can read any book in Epic’s library at any time as many times as they want on any device. There are no ads or in-app purchases, and you can even setup as many as four separate profiles per account. That way different kids can use the same app to access all of their favorite books like Goosebumps , Corduroy , Nancy Clancy , and the Warriors series. The subscription service costs $4.99 a month, but you can try out the service for the first month for free.
